page.title: 12ST. MARY'S SCHOOL
page.content: On June 19th{St. Mary's School celebrated 100 years of education in {Grangetown}with a concelebrated Mass in the Junior School.The Mass was led by{Bishop Augustine Harris}and many people who had been associated with the school in the past attended.The children continued their celebrations after Mass with a video of Superman 3.To mark the day each child was given a centenary mug which had been specially designed. The school was originally situated next to the church on Bolckow Road but moved to its present site on St.Patrick's Road,in 1932.The school has just undergone a major re-modelling in order to bring it upto 1985 standards.
